data.name: Cash Grab - More Loot Boxes!
data.detailed_description: You want loot boxes? We've got loot boxes! Sort of. With this DLC, every time you pick up a Bling Crown in Cash Crab you have a chance to unlock one of the Avatars you don't already have. We know it's not real loot boxes, but even we aren't that greedy!
data.about_the_game: You want loot boxes? We've got loot boxes! Sort of. With this DLC, every time you pick up a Bling Crown in Cash Crab you have a chance to unlock one of the Avatars you don't already have. We know it's not real loot boxes, but even we aren't that greedy!
data.short_description: You want loot boxes? We've got loot boxes! Sort of. With this DLC, every time you pick up a Bling Crown in Cash Crab you have a chance to unlock one of the Avatars you don't already have. We know it's not real loot boxes, but even we aren't that greedy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compliant Video chipset
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Sound Compliant Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Better
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz Dual Core Processor or Higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compliant Video chipset
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Sound Compliant Device
